about_the_game:
Please contact us through the Steam forums to provide feedback or report any bugs.

Note: The main storyline has been completed, providing you with a full game experience. You can participate in Early Access to support this game's development and provide us with valuable feedback.

Overview:
"Time Fissure" is a 3D platformer that blends action, puzzles, and a unique time control element. In this innovative adventure, players traverse through different temporal spaces, unraveling the mysteries and challenges of a virtual town. Armed with a special time slingshot, you'll master the secrets of time—pausing and altering objects' temporal flow to unlock levels, defeat enemies, and unravel the story's mysteries.

Features:

Time Control Mechanism: Utilize the time slingshot to pause or accelerate objects, adding a strategic layer to gameplay.
Multi-Temporal Adventure: Navigate through the present, future, and past in three enthralling chapters, each offering unique challenges and level designs.
Captivating Story: Delve into the narratives of town inhabitants' families, uncover the truth behind the halt in time, with secrets hidden across different eras.
Badge System: Collect coins and gems to unlock badges, offering personalized enhancements and upgrades for your character.
Diverse Level Design: Engage in a variety of gameplay elements, including platform jumping, puzzle-solving, and combat, as you challenge your skills and wit in a journey through time.

name: Time Fissure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: "Time Fissure" is an 3D platformer combining action, puzzles, and unique time control. Explore different time spaces in a mysterious town, overcoming challenges and revealing secrets. Use the time slingshot to manipulate object flows, unlock levels, defeat enemies, and unravel the story.
